skins.shipDescription: Are you the Owner of the port? The "Commander"? Hello. My name is Kasumi, I'll be staying here for the foreseeable future. I hope we can both get along on friendly terms.
skins.selfIntroduction: I wonder how everyone's doing back at the Venus Islands... Oh, shoot! I'm supposed to be assisting you, and here I am letting my thoughts drift. My apologies, Commander.
skins.acquisition: Are you the Owner of the port? The "Commander"? Hello. My name is Kasumi, I'll be staying here for the foreseeable future. I hope we can both get along on friendly terms.
skins.login: Is it time to get to work, Commander? I will be right here, so tell me if you need anything.
skins.details: You call it the "Sakura Empire"? Somehow, it feels really familiar to me. Teehee~
skins.secretaryIdle1: Excuse me, but... what's a secretary supposed to do? My knowledge is bit spotty when it comes to these things...
skins.secretaryIdle2: You can see the sea from mostly anywhere here at the port. The scenery is truly gorgeous!
skins.secretaryIdle3: According to my fortune, today's destiny spot should be somewhere over...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Would you PLEASE show some self-restraint?!

skins.shipDescription: I was amazed to see the port had such a scenic place as this... Truly, you can't go without taking this view in. Right, Commander?
skins.acquisition: I was amazed to see the port had such a scenic place as this... Truly, you can't go without taking this view in. Right, Commander?
skins.login: Are you here for some relaxation as well, Commander? Have yourself a nice, prolonged break from all that paperwork you're used to.
skins.details: Um, Commander... Could you please not stare at me... because... it's a bit embarrassing...
skins.secretaryIdle1: What's your favorite drink, Commander? I'm partial to the... iced café au lait, I suppose.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, are you good at swimming? I'm just curious to see how fast your breaststroke is!
skins.secretaryIdle3: There's nothing... off about my swimsuit, is there?
skins.secretaryTouch: We're taking photos? Well, I'm a bit camera shy, but... okay. How's this pose? Should I stay like this?
